remarks: Equality deduction for operation value, analogous to ~ oveq123d . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
aoveq123d.1 $e |- ( ph -> F = G ) $.
aoveq123d.2 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
aoveq123d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C = D ) $.
aoveq123d $p |- ( ph -> (( A F C )) = (( B G D )) ) $.
